snippet: Lionel Messi is back from an injury, but Barcelona lost Neymar for three to four weeks because of a sprained ankle.
abstract: Barcelona star Neymar is expected to miss three to four weeks due to sprained ankle.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi is back from an injury, but Barcelona lost Neymar for three to four weeks because of a sprained ankle.

headline.main: Though Messi Is Back, Neymar Is Out
